metadata.title: CVE-2018-12601 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a heap-based buffer overflow in ReadImage in input-tga.ci in sam2p0.49.4 that leads to a denial of service or possibly unspecified otherimpact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sam2p package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
